entry.title: RT nader dabit | nader.lens: New starter codebase for anyone interested in building AI-enabled semantic search w/ TypeScript + @nextjs Embeds arbitrar...
entry.summary: RT nader dabit | nader.lens New starter codebase for anyone interested in building AI-enabled semantic search w/ TypeScript + @nextjs Embeds arbitrary text files into vectors, stores them on @pinecone, and enables semantic search using @OpenAI GPT3 and @LangChainAI in a @nextjs UI https://github.com/dabit3/semantic-search-nextjs-pinecone-langchain-chatgpt
